text: A little gem I found, super yummy pastries and cakes right in the centre of London and not expensive at all!

Love this bakery! The buns here are fabulous and there's a large choice of different cakes, buns and other baked goods. Well worth a visit, but be aware it's usually pretty busy and is a tight squeeze as the store is small.

This place is must stop! Absolutely delightful. The pastries are wonderfully delicious. The price is great. It takes great restraint not to buy everything up. The staff is kind and warm. The concept and flow is brilliant. If you need …
expensive but worthy

Stumbled across this jem of a bakery today. It was packed with a stream of people. Very different; you take a large tray, pair tongs & go around selecting different breads. Some are sweet & others savory. I selected a couple of different …
Great selection of bakery. Always busy
I love their fluffy cupcake, very light and not too sweet I can easily eat 2 and not feel guilty:) They have a nice selection of sweet and meal type bread. Don’t forget to carry cash.
Love the custard fish and pandan cake

I go there for some red bean curd filled bread, and Japanese Pot noodle called Cup noodle which I love for snack ( not for a meal). Good price and good quality. 
Not sure I like the very soft chinese style cakes though.... Also they have …

Delicious chicken curry buns and fried dough sticks.  The custard fish are to die for! 
The bakery is self service, its quite easy to get carried away and start piling on the breads as soon as you grab a tray and tongs. The prices are good for the quality of product and your items are packed well.
Favourite Chinese bakery in London
A good selection of baked goods at reasonable prices. Definitely worth a visit if you're in Chinatown.
Great cakes and pastries but staff are so damn miserable and rude!
